column2: It is time to officially dissolve the Russian American company and absorb its lands into the Russian Empire
Now we controll the island of st.helana, we have an oppertunity to rescue Napoleon from the island and re-instate him as the rightfull leader of France
Restore the claims of the French Empire
With Napoleons glorious return, we can now restore our rightfull claim to the Spanish controlled region of Barcelona, and the Dutch region of Wallonia
